languages.text: {n}Кассия одаривает вас холодным взглядом.{/n} "Искусство. Живопись. Пение. Стихосложение. Боюсь, говорить об этом вам будет столь же неинтересно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия одаривает вас холодным взглядом.{/n} "Искусство. Живопись. Пение. Стихосложение. Боюсь, говорить об этом вам будет столь же неинтересно".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia regards you with an icy glare.{/n} "I also enjoy art. Painting. Singing. Writing poetry. But I fear those subjects would equally alien to you."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия одаривает вас холодным взглядом.{/n} "Искусство. Живопись. Пение. Стихосложение. Боюсь, говорить об этом вам будет столь же неинтересно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia regards you with an icy glare.{/n} "There is also art. Painting. Singing. Versification. I am afraid these subjects would be just as alien to you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia regards you with an icy glare.{/n} "There is also art. Painting. Singing. Versification. I am afraid these subjects would be just as alien to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia regards you with an icy glare.{/n} "I also enjoy art. Painting. Singing. Writing poetry. But I fear those subjects would equally alien to you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅冷冰冰地瞪了你一眼。{/n}“我也同样喜欢艺术、绘画、唱歌、写诗，但恐怕这些话题对你而言也同样陌生。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia regards you with an icy glare.{/n} "I also enjoy art. Painting. Singing. Writing poetry. But I fear those subjects would equally alien to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅冷冰冰地瞪了你一眼。{/n}“我也同样喜欢艺术、绘画、唱歌、写诗，但恐怕这些话题对你而言也同样陌生。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia te fulmina con una gélida mirada.{/n} «También disfruto de las artes. Me gusta pintar, cantar y escribir poemas. Imagino que esos temas le resultarían igual de ajenos».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia regards you with an icy glare.{/n} "I also enjoy art. Painting. Singing. Writing poetry. But I fear those subjects would equally alien to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia te fulmina con una gélida mirada.{/n} «También disfruto de las artes. Me gusta pintar, cantar y escribir poemas. Imagino que esos temas le resultarían igual de ajenos».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアは氷のようなまなざしであなたを見つめる。{/n}「あたくしは芸術も好きです。絵を描くこと。歌うこと。詩を書くことも。でも、それらの話題は{name}様にとって同じように異質なものでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia regards you with an icy glare.{/n} "I also enjoy art. Painting. Singing. Writing poetry. But I fear those subjects would equally alien to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは氷のようなまなざしであなたを見つめる。{/n}「あたくしは芸術も好きです。絵を描くこと。歌うこと。詩を書くことも。でも、それらの話題は{name}様にとって同じように異質なものでしょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia mustert dich mit einem eisigen Blick.{/n} "Ich mag auch die Kunst. Gemälde. Gesang. Poesie. Aber ich fürchte, das ist Euch alles gleichsam fremd."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia regards you with an icy glare.{/n} "I also enjoy art. Painting. Singing. Writing poetry. But I fear those subjects would equally alien to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia mustert dich mit einem eisigen Blick.{/n} "Ich mag auch die Kunst. Gemälde. Gesang. Poesie. Aber ich fürchte, das ist Euch alles gleichsam fremd."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « J'apprécie également l'art, {n}rétorque Cassia en vous jetant un regard glacial.{/n} La peinture. Le chant. La poésie. Mais je crains que ces sujets ne vous dépassent. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia regards you with an icy glare.{/n} "I also enjoy art. Painting. Singing. Writing poetry. But I fear those subjects would equally alien to you."

traits.locale_text: « J'apprécie également l'art, {n}rétorque Cassia en vous jetant un regard glacial.{/n} La peinture. Le chant. La poésie. Mais je crains que ces sujets ne vous dépassent. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia sana buz gibi bakışlarla bakıyor.{/n} "Sanattan da hoşlanırım. Resim. Müzik. Şiir yazmak. Bu konular da sana eşit derecede yabancıdır muhtemelen."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia regards you with an icy glare.{/n} "I also enjoy art. Painting. Singing. Writing poetry. But I fear those subjects would equally alien to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia sana buz gibi bakışlarla bakıyor.{/n} "Sanattan da hoşlanırım. Resim. Müzik, Şiir yazmak. Bu konuların da sana eşit derecede yabancı olduğunu tahmin ediyorum ama."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
